sentences.en: Did you have any problems or questions about the evaluation?
sentences.cn: 你在填表时遇到任何难题或疑问 吗 ?

sentences.en: Field evaluation of biologics serves a necessary and useful purpose.
sentences.cn: 生物制品的现场评价是必需而有用的.

sentences.en: I attempted an honest evaluation of my own life.
sentences.cn: 我试图如实地评价我自己的一生.

sentences.en: I've brought my self - evaluation as you asked.
sentences.cn: 我已经照您吩咐,把 自我 评量表带来了.

sentences.en: In the process of evaluation, performance limitations and deficiencies are uncovered.
sentences.cn: 在鉴定的过程中, 特性限度和缺陷被暴露出来.

sentences.en: In their evaluation of the project, they considered only certain aspects of it.
sentences.cn: 在估算这个项目时, 他们只考虑了其中的某些方面.

sentences.en: Petroleum or oil photogeology is primarily an evaluation of bedrock conditions.
sentences.cn: 石油或石油摄影地质主要是研究基岩情况的.

sentences.en: Spatial distribution must also be regarded in the evaluation of competition.
sentences.cn: 在评价竞争时,同样必须注意空间分布.

sentences.en: Tests for evaluation of kerosine are primarily concerned with burning qualities.
sentences.cn: 评价煤油的检验标准主要是燃烧性能.

sentences.en: The evaluation of conduct involves some amount of generalization.
sentences.cn: 对操行的评价会含有一些泛泛之论。

sentences.en: The idea can hardly hope to stand up to a realistic evaluation.
sentences.cn: 这种理想很难相信能够经得住现实的评价.

sentences.en: The new scheme is still under evaluation.
The thoroughness of the evaluation process we went through was impressive.
sentences.cn: 我们亲历的评估过程面面俱到，给人留下了深刻印象。

sentences.en: They took some samples of products for evaluation.
sentences.cn: 他们抽取了一些产品样本以作评估。

sentences.en: We need to carry out a proper evaluation of the new system.
sentences.cn: 我们要对新系统进行合理的评估。

sentences.en: We've still got to carry out an evaluation of the results.
sentences.cn: 我们仍需对结果作出估算.

sentences.en: What is presented to the public as a critical evaluation is really an elaborate puff for him and his magazine.
sentences.cn: 公众所看到的评论界的好评实际上是对他和他的杂志的一种吹捧。

words.tran_cn: 评估员；[电子] 鉴别器；求值程序
评价；[审计]评估；估价；求值

phrases.tran_cn: 评标；报价评审，标书评审
评估报告；评价报告；评定报告
质量评定；品质评价；品质评估

trans.tran_en: a judgment about how good, useful, or successful something is
